mapper.insert: MERGE INTO cart_table USING dual ON ( usr_id = #{usr_id} AND book_bno = #{book_bno} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET cart_amount = cart_amount + #{cart_amount} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (cart_code, book_bno, usr_id, cart_amount) VALUES (seq_cart_code.NEXTVAL, #{book_bno}, #{usr_id}, #{cart_amount})
mapper.select: SELECT c.usr_id, b.book_up_folder, b.book_img, b.book_deposit, b.book_name, c.cart_code, c.book_bno, c.cart_amount FROM cart_table c INNER JOIN book_table b ON c.book_bno = b.book_bno WHERE c.usr_id = #{usr_id}
